response.overview: Solaria has been undercover posing as the girlfriend of the agency's number one most wanted crime boss. She has been dark for months with the only communication handled through her partner, another agent tasked with keeping Solaria safe and the agency up to date. Solaria's deep cover has forced her into a sexual relationship with the crime boss, and as a side effect to the deep cover, Solaria has developed a drug habit. Her ego won't allow her to seek help and her judgement is potentially compromised. Maybe that's why she doesn't realize her partner is about to double cross her. Someone has filmed her fucking the crime boss and is threatening to release the footage if she doesn't fight an incredibly strong villain, a villain whom she's encountered before and barely survived.
response.title: Facade
